'''Calla Lilies''' are a [[Local Specialty]] found in the wild all over [[Mondstadt]].

==How to Obtain==
Calla Lilies grow around water bodies throughout Mondstadt; many can notably be found around the [[Teleport Waypoint]] south of [[Springvale]].

See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=31 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter. Modern medicine recognizes Calla Lily's antidotal properties, but its astringent flavor is repulsive to many people.}}

==Trivia==
* Calla Lily is a common name for the real flowering plant {{w|Zantedeschia aethiopica}}.
* According to [[Noelle]]'s [[Hangout Event]], Calla Lilies have a calming effect.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Art of Hospitality}}</ref>
* According to [[Lisa]], Calla Lilies are medicinal flowers with antidotal properties.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Lisa|Interesting Things}}</ref>
** Calla Lilies are also used for medicine in [[Qingce Village]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Guardians of the Countryside}}</ref>
** The author of [[Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?]] created the fictional drink [[Rainbow Aster]], which the character Yae Masako claims can cure a cold due to the combination of Calla Lilies and [[Mint]]. This drink was later made real as part of a collaboration between the novel and [[Sailing Breeze]] and does use both Calla Lilies and Mint, but no remarks have been made on whether it has medicinal effects or not.
* The following birthday mails included Calla Lily:
** [[Mail/Miss Me? (2021-06-09)|Lisa's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (10 Calla Lily)
** [[Mail/My Secret Tip... (2022-07-05)|Barbara's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (10 Calla Lily)
